text: Austin Collier (24 July 1914 – May 1991) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back in the Football League for Mansfield Town, York City, Rochdale and Halifax Town, in the Scottish Football League for Queen of the South, in non-League football for Upton Colliery, Frickley Colliery, Goole Town and Scarborough, and was on the books of Partick Thistle, Celtic, Third Lanark and Hibernian without making a league appearance. He later served as assistant manager at Halifax Town. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:Sportspeople from Dewsbury Category:1991 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Upton Colliery F.C. players Category:Frickley Athletic F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Partick Thistle F.C. wartime guest players Category:Celtic F.C. wartime guest players Category:Third Lanark A.C. wartime guest players Category:Hibernian F.C. wartime guest players Category:Queen of the South F.C. players Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:Halifax Town A.F.C. players Category:Goole Town F.C. players Category:Scarborough F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Scottish Football League players
title: Austin Collier
